metadata.name: Into the Light
metadata.description:
This photo is the exclusive visual story of the last buffalo shepherd in DokuzpÄ±nar Village of Kayseri Province, Turkey. The buffalo shepherd is on his way back home with his herd, consists of about 500 hundred buffalos.His journey begins in early morning in Hurmetci Grasslands and ends near the bank of a creek while his herd is crossing the creek under the sunset light and dusty path.
